mc.name: Archangel
mc.oracleText: Flying, vigilance
mc.printedText:
Flying
Attacking doesn't cause Archangel to tap.

mc.name: Thunder Dragon
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Thunder Dragon comes into play, it deals 3 damage to each creature without flying.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Thunder Dragon comes into play, it deals 3 damage to each creature without flying. (This includes your creatures.)

mc.name: Thorn Elemental
mc.oracleText: You may have Thorn Elemental assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
mc.printedText: You may have Thorn Elemental deal its combat damage to defending player as though it weren't blocked.

mc.name: Denizen of the Deep
mc.oracleText: When Denizen of the Deep comes into play, return each other creature you control to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText: When Denizen of the Deep comes into play, return all other creatures you control from play to their owner's hand.

mc.name: Dakmor Sorceress
mc.oracleText: Dakmor Sorceress's power is equal to the number of Swamps you control.
mc.printedText: Dakmor Sorceress's power is equal to the number of swamps you control. (Count only the swamps you have in play, including both tapped and untapped swamps.)

mc.name: Champion Lancer
mc.oracleText: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Champion Lancer by creatures.
mc.printedText: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Champion Lancer by creatures.
mc.flavorText: The flash of his lance projects the pure radiance of his honor.

mc.name: Goblin General
mc.oracleText: Whenever Goblin General attacks, Goblin creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: When Goblin General attacks, all Goblins you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Lead, follow, or run around like crazy.

mc.name: Dakmor Lancer
mc.oracleText: When Dakmor Lancer comes into play, destroy target nonblack creature.
mc.printedText: When Dakmor Lancer comes into play, destroy target nonblack creature.
mc.flavorText: The darkness of his shield reflects the inky blackness of his soul.

mc.name: Vizzerdrix
mc.flavorText: Its swamp cousin may be meaner, but the vizzerdrix is much bigger.

mc.name: Devastation
mc.oracleText: Destroy all creatures and lands.
mc.printedText: Destroy all creatures and all lands. (This includes your creatures and lands.)
mc.flavorText: There is much talk about the art of creation. What about the art of destruction?

mc.name: Fire Tempest
mc.oracleText: Fire Tempest deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.
mc.printedText: Fire Tempest deals 6 damage to each creature and each player. (This includes your creatures and you.)

mc.name: Relentless Assault
mc.oracleText: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.
mc.printedText: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. You get another combat phase, followed by another main phase, this turn.

mc.name: Last Chance
mc.oracleText: Take an extra turn after this one. At the end of that turn, you lose the game.
mc.printedText: Take another turn after this one. You lose the game at the end of that turn. (You won't lose if you've won before the end of that turn.)

mc.name: Goblin Glider
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Goblin Glider can't block.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Goblin Glider can't block.
mc.flavorText: The goblins call the gliders "death from above." Everyone else calls them "clods in the clouds."

mc.name: Goblin Commando
mc.oracleText: When Goblin Commando comes into play, it deals 2 damage to target creature.
mc.printedText: When Goblin Commando comes into play, it deals 2 damage to target creature.
mc.flavorText: With a commando around, somebody's gonna get hurt.

mc.name: Hulking Ogre
mc.oracleText: Hulking Ogre can't block.
mc.printedText: Hulking Ogre can't block.
mc.flavorText: Once they realized the ogre had more size than speed, the soldiers simply went around it.

mc.name: Fire Elemental
mc.flavorText: You are drawn to your death as a moth to the flame.

mc.name: Earth Elemental
mc.flavorText: Its voice has the tremor of deafening thunder, its blow the force of an avalanche.

mc.name: Spitting Earth
mc.oracleText: Spitting Earth deals damage equal to the number of Mountains you control to target creature.
mc.printedText: Spitting Earth deals to target creature damage equal to the number of mountains you control. (Count only the mountains you have in play, including both tapped and untapped mountains.)

mc.name: Cinder Storm
mc.oracleText: Cinder Storm deals 7 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: Cinder Storm deals 7 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: When the sky's rain has turned to fire, what will put it out?

mc.name: Goblin Lore
mc.oracleText: Draw four cards, then discard three cards at random.
mc.printedText: Draw four cards, then discard three cards at random from your hand.
mc.flavorText:
"I done forgot more than you'll ever know, pipsqueak."
"Yeah--that's your problem."

mc.name: Jagged Lightning
mc.oracleText: Jagged Lightning deals 3 damage to target creature and 3 damage to another target creature.
mc.printedText: Jagged Lightning deals 3 damage to target creature and 3 damage to another target creature. (You can't play this card unless you can choose two creatures in play.)

mc.name: Lava Axe
mc.oracleText: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player.
mc.printedText: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target opponent.
mc.flavorText: Meant to cut through the body and burn straight to the soul.

mc.name: Volcanic Hammer
mc.oracleText: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: Fire finds its form in the heat of the forge.

mc.name: Tremor
mc.oracleText: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
mc.printedText: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying. (This includes your creatures.)
mc.flavorText: One little goblin shook up the ground. When the dust cleared, no one was found.

mc.name: Stone Rain
mc.oracleText: Destroy target land.
mc.printedText: Destroy target land.

mc.name: Scorching Spear
mc.oracleText: Scorching Spear deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: Scorching Spear deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: Lift your spear as you might lift your glass, and toast your enemy.

mc.name: Raging Goblin
mc.oracleText: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
mc.printedText: Haste (This creature may attack the turn it comes into play.)
mc.flavorText: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

mc.name: Goblin Mountaineer
mc.oracleText: Mountainwalk
mc.printedText: Mountainwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player has a mountain in play.)
mc.flavorText: Goblin mountaineer, barely keeps his family fed.

mc.name: Hulking Goblin
mc.oracleText: Hulking Goblin can't block.
mc.printedText: Hulking Goblin can't block.
mc.flavorText: The bigger they are, the harder they avoid work.

mc.name: Goblin Chariot
mc.oracleText: Haste (This creature can attack the turn it comes under your control.)
mc.printedText: Haste (This creature may attack the turn it comes into play.)
mc.flavorText: They have to replace the wheels, they have to replace the boar, and sometimes they have to replace the goblin.

mc.name: Goblin Cavaliers
mc.flavorText: They get along so well with their goats because they're practically goats themselves.

mc.name: Goblin Settler
mc.oracleText: When Goblin Settler comes into play, destroy target land.
mc.printedText: When Goblin Settler comes into play, destroy target land.
mc.flavorText: Be it ever so crumbled, there's no place like home.

mc.name: Sylvan Yeti
mc.oracleText: Sylvan Yeti's power is equal to the number of cards in your hand.
mc.printedText: Sylvan Yeti's power is equal to the number of cards in your hand.
mc.flavorText: The deeper the wood, the greater its strength.

mc.name: Sylvan Basilisk
mc.oracleText: Whenever Sylvan Basilisk becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature.
mc.printedText: When Sylvan Basilisk becomes blocked, destroy all creatures blocking it. (Destroy the creatures before they deal damage. Sylvan Basilisk still doesn't deal damage to defending player.)

mc.name: Whirlwind
mc.oracleText: Destroy all creatures with flying.
mc.printedText: Destroy all creatures with flying. (This includes your creatures.)

mc.name: Squall
mc.oracleText: Squall deals 2 damage to each creature with flying.
mc.printedText: Squall deals 2 damage to each creature with flying. (This includes your creatures.)
mc.flavorText:
"To-night the winds begin to rise . . .
The rooks are blown about the skies . . . ."
--Alfred, Lord Tennyson, In Memoriam

mc.name: Alluring Scent
mc.oracleText: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.
mc.printedText: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.
mc.flavorText: No earthly armor is protection against this sweetness.

mc.name: Nature's Cloak
mc.oracleText: Green creatures you control gain forestwalk until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Green creatures you control gain forestwalk until end of turn. (They're unblockable as long as defending player has a forest in play.)

mc.name: Pride of Lions
mc.oracleText: You may have Pride of Lions assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
mc.printedText: You may have Pride of Lions deal its combat damage to defending player as though it weren't blocked.

mc.name: Wood Elves
mc.oracleText: When Wood Elves comes into play, search your library for a Forest card and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: When Wood Elves comes into play, search your library for a forest card and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.

mc.name: Lone Wolf
mc.oracleText: You may have Lone Wolf assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
mc.printedText: Lone Wolf may deal its combat damage to defending player as though it weren't blocked.

mc.name: Bull Hippo
mc.oracleText: Islandwalk
mc.printedText: Islandwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player has an island in play.)
mc.flavorText: Stay alert: his lumbering may shake the ground itself, but in water, he glides.

mc.name: Wild Ox
mc.oracleText: Swampwalk
mc.printedText: Swampwalk (This creature is unblockable s long as defending player has a swamp in play.)
mc.flavorText: It has the run of the swamps, and it knows it.

mc.name: Untamed Wilds
mc.oracleText: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: Search your library for a plains, island, swamp, mountain, or forest card and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.

mc.name: Moon Sprite
mc.oracleText: Flying
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText:
"I am that merry wanderer of the night."
--William Shakespeare,
A Midsummer Night's Dream

mc.name: Whiptail Wurm
mc.flavorText: It's hard to say for certain which end is more dangerous.

mc.name: Natural Spring
mc.oracleText: Target player gains 8 life.
mc.printedText: You gain 8 life.
mc.flavorText: The dying ask for water because they know it contains life.

mc.name: Grizzly Bears
mc.flavorText: Don't worry about provoking grizzly bears; they come that way.

mc.name: Monstrous Growth
mc.oracleText: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: The nightstalkers' little game of tease-the-squirrel suddenly took an unexpected turn.

mc.name: Nature's Lore
mc.oracleText: Search your library for a Forest card and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: Search your library for a forest card and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: Every seed planted is another lesson the forest can teach us.

mc.name: Renewing Touch
mc.oracleText: Shuffle any number of target creature cards from your graveyard into your library.
mc.printedText: Shuffle any number of creature cards from your graveyard into your library.
mc.flavorText: Death just encourages life the more.

mc.name: Grim Tutor
mc.oracleText: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library. You lose 3 life.
mc.printedText: Search your library for any card and put that card into your hand. You lose 3 life.
mc.flavorText:
He who goes unpunished never learns.
--Greek proverb

mc.name: Ancient Craving
mc.oracleText: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.
mc.printedText: Draw three cards. You lose 3 life.
mc.flavorText: Knowledge demands sacrifice.

mc.name: Wicked Pact
mc.oracleText: Destroy two target nonblack creatures. You lose 5 life.
mc.printedText: Destroy two target nonblack creatures. You lose 5 life. (You can't play this card unless you can choose two creatures in play.)

mc.name: Dread Reaper
mc.oracleText:
Flying

When Dread Reaper comes into play, you lose 5 life.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Dread Reaper comes into play, you lose 5 life.

mc.name: Shrieking Specter
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Shrieking Specter attacks, defending player discards a card.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Shrieking Specter attacks, defending player chooses and discards a card from his or her hand.

mc.name: Stream of Acid
mc.oracleText: Destroy target land or nonblack creature.
mc.printedText: Destroy target land or nonblack creature.

mc.name: Soul Feast
mc.oracleText: Target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.
mc.printedText: Target player loses 4 life. You gain 4 life.
mc.flavorText: Evil often dines alone.

mc.name: Coercion
mc.oracleText: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. Choose a card from it. That player discards that card.
mc.printedText: Look at target player's hand and choose a card from it. That player discards that card.
mc.flavorText: "Human tenderness is simply weakness in a pretty package."

mc.name: Dakmor Plague
mc.oracleText: Dakmor Plague deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.
mc.printedText: Dakmor Plague deals 3 damage to each creature and each player. (This includes your creatures and you.)
mc.flavorText: The tiniest cough can be deadlier than the fiercest dragon.

mc.name: Dark Offering
mc.oracleText: Destroy target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.
mc.printedText: Destroy target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.
mc.flavorText:
"Our greatest hope has become our enemy's greatest triumph."
--Court counselor

mc.name: Howling Fury
mc.oracleText: Target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: I howl my soul to the moon, and the moon howls with me.

mc.name: Ravenous Rats
mc.oracleText: When Ravenous Rats comes into play, target opponent discards a card.
mc.printedText: When Ravenous Rats comes into play, target player chooses and discards a card from his or her hand.

mc.name: Serpent Warrior
mc.oracleText: When Serpent Warrior comes into play, you lose 3 life.
mc.printedText: When Serpent Warrior comes into play, you lose 3 life.
mc.flavorText: A hiss before dying.

mc.name: Gravedigger
mc.oracleText: When Gravedigger comes into play, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText: When Gravedigger comes into play, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

mc.name: Feral Shadow
mc.oracleText: Flying
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: Not all shadows are cast by light--some are cast by darkness.

mc.name: Bog Wraith
mc.oracleText: Swampwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
mc.printedText: Swampwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player has a swamp in play.)
mc.flavorText: It moved through the troops leaving no footprints, save on their souls.

mc.name: Muck Rats
mc.flavorText:
"Just as some fool said it couldn't get worse, the rats began to show up."
--Foot soldier

mc.name: Bog Imp
mc.oracleText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: Don't be fooled by their looks. Think of them as little knives with wings.

mc.name: Raise Dead
mc.oracleText: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.flavorText: The earth cannot hold that which magic commands.

mc.name: Mind Rot
mc.oracleText: Target player discards two cards.
mc.printedText: Target player chooses and discards two cards from his or her hand. (If that player has only one card, he or she discards it.)

mc.name: Hand of Death
mc.oracleText: Destroy target nonblack creature.
mc.printedText: Destroy target nonblack creature.
mc.flavorText: The touch of death is never gentle.

mc.name: Dakmor Ghoul
mc.oracleText: When Dakmor Ghoul comes into play, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
mc.printedText: When Dakmor Ghoul comes into play, target opponent loses 2 life. You gain 2 life.
mc.flavorText:
"Cursed be the sickly forms that err from honest Nature's rule"
--Alfred, Lord Tennyson, "Locksley Hall"

mc.name: Chorus of Woe
mc.oracleText: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: When nightstalkers sing, nothing in creation sleeps.

mc.name: Counterspell
mc.oracleText: Counter target spell.
mc.printedText: Counter target spell.

mc.name: Dakmor Scorpion
mc.flavorText: A scorpion this big you won't find curled up in your boot. Maybe around your boot, but not in it.

mc.name: Bog Raiders
mc.oracleText: Swampwalk
mc.printedText: Swampwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player has a swamp in play.)
mc.flavorText: Those who live amid decay must expect scavengers.

mc.name: Hollow Dogs
mc.oracleText: Whenever Hollow Dogs attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Whenever Hollow Dogs attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: A hollow dog is never empty. It is filled with thirst for the hunt.

mc.name: Gerrard's Wisdom
mc.oracleText: You gain 2 life for each card in your hand.
mc.printedText: For each card in your hand, you gain 2 life. (Don't count this card.)
mc.flavorText: "You'll lose a duel if your enemy comes expecting a war."

mc.name: Armageddon
mc.oracleText: Destroy all lands.
mc.printedText: Destroy all lands. (This includes your lands.)

mc.name: Blinding Light
mc.oracleText: Tap all nonwhite creatures.
mc.printedText: Tap all nonwhite creatures.
mc.flavorText: Let the unjust avert their faces and contemplate their peril.

mc.name: Loyal Sentry
mc.oracleText: When Loyal Sentry blocks a creature, destroy that creature and Loyal Sentry.
mc.printedText: When Loyal Sentry blocks, destroy it and the creature it blocks. (Destroy both creatures before dealing damage.)

mc.name: Angel of Light
mc.oracleText: Flying, vigilance
mc.printedText:
Flying
Attacking doesn't cause Angel of Light to tap.

mc.name: Angel of Mercy
mc.oracleText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Angel of Mercy comes into play, you gain 3 life.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Angel of Mercy comes into play, you gain 3 life.

mc.name: Vengeance
mc.oracleText: Destroy target tapped creature.
mc.printedText: Destroy target tapped creature.
mc.flavorText: Bitter as wormwood, sweet as mulled wine.

mc.name: Royal Trooper
mc.oracleText: Whenever Royal Trooper blocks, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: When Royal Trooper blocks, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Fortune does not side with the faint-hearted."
--Sophocles, Phaedra

mc.name: Devout Monk
mc.oracleText: When Devout Monk comes into play, you gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: When Devout Monk comes into play, you gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText: Discipline wears many robes.

mc.name: Border Guard
mc.flavorText: "Join the army, see foreign countries" they'd said.

mc.name: Knight Errant
mc.flavorText:
". . . Before honor is humility."
--The Bible, Proverbs 15:33

mc.name: Foot Soldiers
mc.flavorText: Infantry deployment is the art of putting your troops in the wrong place at the right time.

mc.name: Steadfastness
mc.oracleText: Creatures you control get +0/+3 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Creatures you control get +0/+3 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Brute force wins the battles. Conviction wins the wars.

mc.name: Angelic Blessing
mc.oracleText: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
mc.printedText: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Only the warrior who can admit mortal weakness will be bolstered by immortal strength.

mc.name: Charging Paladin
mc.oracleText: Whenever Charging Paladin attacks, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Whenever Charging Paladin attacks, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: A true warrior's thoughts are of victory, not death.

mc.name: Veteran Cavalier
mc.oracleText: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
mc.printedText: Attacking doesn't cause Veteran Cavalier to tap.
mc.flavorText:
Spirit is the sword and experience the sharpening stone.
--Arabian proverb

mc.name: Abyssal Horror
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Abyssal Horror comes into play, target player discards two cards.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Abyssal Horror comes into play, target player chooses and discards two cards from his or her hand. (If that player has only one card, he or she discards it.)

mc.name: Volcanic Dragon
mc.oracleText: Flying, haste
mc.printedText: Flying; haste (This creature may attack the turn it comes into play.)
mc.flavorText: Speed and fire are always a deadly combination.

mc.name: Eager Cadet
mc.flavorText: The enthusiasm of the young, sharpened by the discipline of a soldier.

mc.name: Breath of Life
mc.oracleText: Return target creature card from your graveyard to play.
mc.printedText: Put target creature card from your graveyard into play.

mc.name: Righteous Charge
mc.oracleText: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Bravery shines brightest in a pure soul.

mc.name: Bargain
mc.oracleText:
Target opponent draws a card.
You gain 7 life.
mc.printedText:
Target opponent draws a card.
You gain 7 life.
mc.flavorText: Bargaining with a goblin is like trading with a child; both believe they already own everything.

mc.name: Coral Eel
mc.flavorText: Some fishers like to eat eels, and some eels like to eat fishers.

mc.name: Giant Octopus
mc.flavorText: At the sight of the thing the calamari vendor's eyes went wide, but from fear or avarice none could tell.

mc.name: Storm Crow
mc.oracleText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText:
Storm crow descending, winter unending.
Storm crow departing, summer is starting.

mc.name: Wind Drake
mc.oracleText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: "No bird soars too high, if he soars with his own wings."William Blake, The Marriage of Heaven and Hell

mc.name: Snapping Drake
mc.oracleText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: Drakes claim to be dragons--until the dragons show up.

mc.name: Sea Eagle
mc.oracleText: Flying
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: Where air meets water, fish meets talon.

mc.name: Touch of Brilliance
mc.oracleText: Draw two cards.
mc.printedText: Draw two cards.
mc.flavorText: "I don't want what I don't have. I want more of what I do have."

mc.name: Time Ebb
mc.oracleText: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
mc.printedText: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
mc.flavorText: Like the tide, time both ebbs and flows.

mc.name: Eye Spy
mc.oracleText: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card into his or her graveyard.
mc.printedText: Look at the top card of target player's library. Put that card back on top of that library or into that player's graveyard.

mc.name: Extinguish
mc.oracleText: Counter target sorcery spell.
mc.printedText: Counter target sorcery spell.

mc.name: Remove Soul
mc.oracleText: Counter target creature spell.
mc.printedText: Counter target creature spell.
mc.flavorText: When your enemies are denied soldiers, they are denied victory.

mc.name: Man-o'-War
mc.oracleText: When Man-o'-War comes into play, return target creature to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText: When Man-o'-War comes into play, return target creature to its owner's hand.
mc.flavorText: Beauty to the eye does not always translate to the touch.

mc.name: Phantom Warrior
mc.oracleText: Phantom Warrior is unblockable.
mc.printedText: Phantom Warrior is unblockable.
mc.flavorText: The phantom warrior comes from nowhere and returns there just as quickly.

mc.name: Water Elemental
mc.flavorText:
The water that a ship sails on is the same water that swallows it up.
--Chinese proverb

mc.name: Air Elemental
mc.oracleText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: As insubstantial, and as powerful, as the wind that carries it.

mc.name: Owl Familiar
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Owl Familiar comes into play, draw a card, then discard a card.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Owl Familiar comes into play, draw a card, then choose and discard a card from your hand.

mc.name: Ingenious Thief
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Ingenious Thief comes into play, look at target player's hand.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Ingenious Thief comes into play, look at target player's hand.

mc.name: Exhaustion
mc.oracleText: Creatures and lands target opponent controls don't untap during his or her next untap step.
mc.printedText: Creatures and lands target opponent controls don't untap during his or her next untap step.

mc.name: Undo
mc.oracleText: Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.
mc.printedText: Return two target creatures to their owner's hand. (You can't play this card unless you can choose two creatures in play.)

mc.name: Relearn
mc.oracleText: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.flavorText: The hardest lessons to grasp are the ones you've already learned.

mc.name: Tidings
mc.oracleText: Draw four cards.
mc.printedText: Draw four cards.
mc.flavorText:
"Many wearing rapiers are afraid of goose-quills."
--William Shakespeare, Hamlet

mc.name: Time Warp
mc.oracleText: Target player takes an extra turn after this one.
mc.printedText: Target player takes another turn after this one.
mc.flavorText:
"Let's do it again"
--Squee, goblin cabin hand

mc.name: Piracy
mc.oracleText: Until end of turn, you may play mana abilities of lands you don't control, putting the mana they generate into your mana pool. Use mana produced this way only to play spells.
mc.printedText: This turn, you may tap lands you don't control to help pay for your spells.
mc.flavorText: The sea gives, and the sea takes. Some just help with the taking.

mc.name: Psychic Transfer
mc.oracleText: If the difference between your life total and target player's life total is 5 or less, exchange life totals with that player.
mc.printedText: If the difference between your life total and target player's life total is 5 or less, exchange life totals with that player.

mc.name: Willow Elf
mc.flavorText: The forest lives in the elf as the elf lives in the forest.

mc.name: Norwood Ranger
mc.flavorText: Some trees bear deadly fruit.

mc.name: Lynx
mc.oracleText: Forestwalk
mc.printedText: Forestwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player has a forest in play.)
mc.flavorText: Rarely seen, hardly heard, never caught.

mc.name: Norwood Archers
mc.oracleText: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
mc.printedText: Norwood Archers can block as though it had flying.
mc.flavorText:
"--'Air superiority?' Not while our archers scan the skies."
--Elvish scout

mc.name: Durkwood Boars
mc.flavorText: "And the unclean spirits went out, and entered the swine; and the herd ran violently . . . ."The Bible, Mark 5:13

mc.name: Royal Falcon
mc.oracleText: Flying
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: Hunter by instinct, weapon by training.

mc.name: Devoted Hero
mc.flavorText: The heart's courage is the soul's guardian.

mc.name: Wild Griffin
mc.oracleText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: Two little goblins, out in the sun. Down came a griffin, and then there was one.

mc.name: Venerable Monk
mc.oracleText: When Venerable Monk comes into play, you gain 2 life.
mc.printedText: When Venerable Monk comes into play, you gain 2 life.
mc.flavorText: Age wears the flesh but galvanizes the soul.

mc.name: Path of Peace
mc.oracleText: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.
mc.printedText: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.
mc.flavorText:
"You could die famous or you could die old. I chose old."
--Former soldier

mc.name: Sacred Nectar
mc.oracleText: You gain 4 life.
mc.printedText: You gain 4 life.
mc.flavorText:
"For he on honey-dew hath fed,
And drunk the milk of Paradise."
--Samuel Taylor Coleridge, "Kubla Khan"

mc.name: Ardent Militia
mc.oracleText: Vigilance
mc.printedText: Attacking doesn't cause Ardent Militia to tap.
mc.flavorText: Some fight for honor and some for gold, but the militia fight for hearth and home.

mc.name: False Peace
mc.oracleText: Target player skips all combat phases of his or her next turn.
mc.printedText: Target player can't attack on his or her next turn.
mc.flavorText: Mutual consent is not required for war.

mc.name: Righteous Fury
mc.oracleText: Destroy all tapped creatures. You gain 2 life for each creature destroyed this way.
mc.printedText: Destroy all tapped creatures. For each creature destroyed this way, you gain 2 life.

mc.name: Mons's Goblin Raiders
mc.flavorText: Just because they have a club doesn't mean they're organized.

mc.name: Goblin Hero
mc.flavorText: When you're a goblin, you don't have to step forward to be a hero--everyone else just has to step back.

mc.name: Sleight of Hand
mc.oracleText: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.
mc.printedText: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other one on the bottom of your library.

mc.name: Ransack
mc.oracleText: Look at the top five cards of target player's library. Put any number of them on the bottom of that library in any order and the rest on top of the library in any order.
mc.printedText: Look at the top five cards of target player's library. Put any number of them on the bottom of that library in any order and the rest on top of the library in any order.

mc.name: Ogre Warrior
mc.flavorText: Assault and battery included.

mc.name: Southern Elephant
mc.flavorText: Neither predator nor prey, the elephant chooses its place in the battle.

mc.name: Silverback Ape
mc.flavorText: His true majesty is not in his silver, but in his size.

mc.name: Gorilla Warrior
mc.flavorText: They were formidable even before they learned the use of weapons.

mc.name: Wind Sail
mc.oracleText: One or two target creatures gain flying until end of turn.
mc.printedText: One or two target creatures gain flying until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: It pays to be at home both on the sea and in the sky.

mc.name: Barbtooth Wurm
mc.flavorText: In its lair lies a carpet of bones.

mc.name: Summer Bloom
mc.oracleText: You may play up to three additional lands this turn.
mc.printedText: Put up to three land cards from your hand into play.
mc.flavorText: Summer sends its kiss with warmth and blooming life.

mc.name: Merfolk of the Pearl Trident
mc.flavorText: Are merfolk humans with fins, or are humans merfolk with feet?

mc.name: Scathe Zombies
mc.flavorText: Luckily for them, it doesn't take much brains to slaughter and maim.

mc.name: Trained Orgg
mc.flavorText: All orggs know how to kill; training teaches them what to kill.
